item.title: Projects
item.description:
Improving Neural-Network Classifiers Using Nearest Neighbor Partitioning

Implemented the paper Wang, Lin, et al. “Improving neural-network classifiers using nearest neighbor partitioning."

A neural network is used to reduce the dimensionality of data, so as to perform KNN faster. This neural network is trained using particle swarm optimization

Movie Recommender

Movie Recommendation System that uses collaborative filtering. We use the MovieLens100K Dataset to obtain data for the system.

Github Action: pipreqs-action

Github action that automatically creates the requirement.txt file for your python project using pipreqs

NITK-SC-Portal

Student Council Portal for NITK. Display information about the council members and various clubs of NITK and arange them into different groups.

File System Benchmarking

Presented at 3rd International Conference on Trends in Electronics and Informatics 2019

G. Rakshith, R. Rozario, M. Rhevanth, K. M. Nikitha and B. R. Mohan, “Performance analysis of secondary storage media through file systems benchmarking,” 2019 3rd International Conference on Trends in Electronics and Informatics (ICOEI), Tirunelveli, India, 2019, pp. 1222-1226, doi: 10.1109/ICOEI.2019.8862717.

Smart Contract for Loyalty Points Systems

Designed the smart contracts for a loyalty program system, where the loyalty points are ERC20 Mintable tokens and each retailer has his own token.

ACO based algorithm to solve Travelling Salesman Probelem

Designed an algorithm to approximately solve the Travelling Salesman Probelem using ant colony optimization

R-Trees in Python

Implementing the data structure of R-Trees to store spacial information.

item.title: Ryan Rozario
item.description:
I am a pre-final year at National Institute of Technology Karnataka majoring in Information Technology. I am currently exploring the fields of Web Development, Machine Learning, Blockchain and Cryptography.

I am a curious person who loves discovering how things work and finding ways to make them better. In my spare time, I am an avid reader of crime thrillers, love playing CTFs and am trying to improve my cooking skills.

GitHub

Contact me at ryan.rozario1999@gmail.com

Education

B.Tech Information Technology - National Institute of Technology Karnataka - CGPA 8.58

Grade 12 - CBSE - 92.8 %

Grade 10 - CBSE - CGPA 10
